sentences.en: He is attending to the matter himself.
sentences.cn: 他正在亲自办理这件事.

sentences.en: I'd better leave you attending to your business. We can have a chat some other time.
sentences.cn: 你忙正经事吧, 我们改天再拉扯.

sentences.en: John recalled attending school with Mary.
sentences.cn: 约翰回想起同玛丽一起上学的情景.

sentences.en: Most of those attending the funeral stood silently showing little emotion.
sentences.cn: 出席葬礼的人大多都面无表情地静静站着。

sentences.en: She excused herself from attending the meeting.
She has been attending upon her sick mother for years.
sentences.cn: 她侍奉她生病的母亲已有多年了.

sentences.en: She was debarred from attending the meeting.
sentences.cn: 她被禁止参加这次会议.

sentences.en: The bad weather precluded me from attending the meeting.
sentences.cn: 恶劣的天气使我不能出席会议.

sentences.en: The dead included six people attending a religious ceremony.
sentences.cn: 死者包括6位参加宗教仪式的人。

sentences.en: The Jordanian leader seemed amenable to attending a conference.
sentences.cn: 约旦领导人似乎愿意参加会议。

sentences.en: The patient has a nurse attending ( on ) him .
Those not attending the meeting may vote by proxy.
sentences.cn: 那些未出席会议的可以请他人代为投票。

sentences.en: Urgent business kept me from attending the meeting.
sentences.cn: 因有急事我不能去参加会议.

sentences.en: We shall be attending the upcoming concert.
sentences.cn: 我们要去听即将上演的音乐会.

sentences.en: We went to the Biology class instead of attending the English lesson.
sentences.cn: 我们去上生物课而不去上英语课.

trans.tran_cn: 参加( attend的现在分词 )，注意，听，照顾，[常用被动语态]（作为结果、情况）伴随
